titleStmt.title: The information of John Macnamara, Gent., touching the Popish plot in Ireland carried on by the conspiracies of the Earl of Tyrone, and others his confederates to deliver up that kingdom to the French king, and establish the Popish religion therein : being all matter of fact, delivered upon oath to His Majesty, and both Houses of Parliament, in Novemb. 1680.
titleStmt.author: Macnamara, John, Gent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
